description:
Dogstorm confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Cat Viper faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro’s death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated
Cap vers l`aube. L`ascension du dragon de pêche !
Steig empor zur Morgendämmerung! – Der pinke Drache wütet herum
Yoake e to Nobore! Momoiro no Ryuu Takeru
Вознестись к рассвету! Волнительный клич розового дракона!"
夜明けへと昇れ! 桃色の龍猛る
